childNoteList.content: 50% for children under 30kg, height under 130cm shared with adults.
Children under 20kg and 112cm in height are free of charge with adults.
Weight 30kg, Height from 130cm or more is 100% separate.

contentLuggage: Please stamp your luggage before handing it over to the service staff.

regulationContentList.content: Do not accept goods and luggage on the list of prohibited and illegal goods.
Fragile and perishable baggage, fresh items need to be packed in accordance with specifications and regulations and must be responsible for themselves when there are risks during transportation.

Do not accept high-value checked baggage: money, jewelry, precious metals, confidentiality contracts, administrative documents or other items of high value. Please declare for high-value baggage: Free baggage of 25kg and size for 01 piece not exceeding 100cm. Cases that do not meet the above weight and size will be charged an additional fee.

We are not responsible for damages caused by defects in nature, quality or omission of baggage. Likewise, we will not be liable for reasonable wear and tear of baggage caused by normal movement and impact during transportation.

We compensate passengers for damage to their baggage based on the general principle of compensation according to the actual damage but not in excess of the limit of our liability. Passengers are responsible for proving actual damage to their baggage. General regulations on compensation for lost baggage: Compensation 200,000-500,000vnd. We receive information right at the time of getting off the bus (call or text), but we do not receive reports after leaving the car.

policyOnChange: POLICY TO CHANGE, CANCEL, POSTPONE SCHEDULE:

policyOnChangeList.content: A fee of 17% / voucher will apply when notified 15:00 in advance of the departure date.
Apply a 50% fee/voucher after 15:00 and 05 hours before the departure time of the bus.
Cancellation, postponement, or change are not applicable 05 hours before the departure time.

For groups of 03 people or more, cancel, postpone or reschedule before 24:00 compared to the departure time of the departure date. After 10:00 a.m., no cancellation, postponement, or rescheduling will be accepted.
Holidays and Tet do not apply the above cancellation and postponement policies.

policyOnOrtherList.content: Please arrive 15 minutes before the departure time to complete the procedure.
Each passenger is allowed a maximum of 07kg of carry-on baggage and 20kg of checked baggage.
The voucher will be invalid if: the full name on the voucher and the person who travels have different names, the phone number does not match.
In order to avoid affecting the people around us, the company refuses to serve passengers who cause disturbances, eat in the car, people who are drunk, and use drugs.
The voucher includes VAT (voucher has no payment value). After 24 hours, you do not take the invoice, ask for permission to issue retail invoices.
